channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Guardium Data Encryption
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Guardium Data Encryption

item.title: CVE-2019-4701|2024-09-16T17:18:24.414Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 is deployed with active debugging code that can create unintended entry points. IBM X-Force ID: 171936.

item.title: CVE-2019-4713|2024-09-16T18:49:30.400Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 172084.

item.title: CVE-2019-4697|2024-09-16T16:28:50.877Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 171938.

item.title: CVE-2019-4691|2024-09-16T16:17:49.514Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 171828.

item.title: CVE-2019-4702|2024-09-16T17:28:57.203Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 specifies permissions for a security-critical resource in a way that allows that resource to be read or modified by unintended actors.

item.title: CVE-2021-39021|2024-09-16T20:06:39.978Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 5.0.0.2 behaves differently or sends different responses under different circumstances in a way that is observable to an unauthorized actor, which could facilitate username enumeration. IBM X-Force ID: 213856.

item.title: CVE-2019-4686|2024-09-16T18:18:55.301Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. Attackers may be able to get the cookie values by sending a http:// link to a user or by planting this link in a site the user goes to. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic. IBM X-Force ID: 171822.

item.title: CVE-2019-4688|2024-09-16T16:23:24.830Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. Attackers may be able to get the cookie values by sending a http:// link to a user or by planting this link in a site the user goes to. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic. IBM X-Force ID: 171825.

item.title: CVE-2019-4698|2024-09-16T19:19:07.185Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.2 does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 171929.
